meanings.definition: A person or thing that stuffs
meanings.sent1: The turkey stuffer carefully filled the bird with delicious stuffing.
meanings.sent2: The toy stuffer quickly packed the teddy bear with soft cotton.
meanings.sent3: The sock stuffer accidentally put too many socks in the drawer!
meanings.sent4: The book stuffer crammed the shelves with exciting novels.
meanings.sent5: The gift stuffer made sure each present was perfectly wrapped and filled.

meanings.definition: A type of sausage or other food filled with a mixture of ingredients
meanings.sent1: The sandwich stuffer was overflowing with tasty meats and cheeses.
meanings.sent2: The burrito stuffer added extra beans and rice to the wrap.
meanings.sent3: The taco stuffer burst open with spicy goodness when bitten into.
meanings.sent4: The pastry stuffer was a delightful surprise with its sweet filling.
meanings.sent5: The dumpling stuffer was steaming hot and bursting with flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of padding or material used to fill something, such as a pillow or toy
meanings.sent1: The pillow stuffer fluffed up the cushion with soft feathers.
meanings.sent2: The jacket stuffer kept the wearer warm with its cozy insulation.
meanings.sent3: The plush toy stuffer made sure the bear was cuddly and huggable.
meanings.sent4: The mattress stuffer provided extra comfort with its thick layers.
meanings.sent5: The cushion stuffer made the chair extra comfortable for sitting.
